snippet: Despite the risks of angering fans and derailing momentum, the lure of clawing back hundreds of millions of dollars from the players made owners willing to lock them out.
abstract: NHL players remain locked out by the owners and commissioner Gary Bettman despite the risks of angering fans and derailing momentum.

byline.original: By JEFF Z. KLEIN and KEN BELSON

lead_paragraph: Despite the risks of angering fans and derailing momentum, the lure of clawing back hundreds of millions of dollars from the players made owners willing to lock them out.

headline.seo: N.H.L. Owners See Lockout as a Calculated Risk
headline.main: For N.H.L. Owners, Lockout Is a Calculated Risk
headline.print_headline: Learning From Past, N.H.L. Owners See the Lockout as a Calculated Risk
